SITE_VIEW.SITE_NAME_HELP: The name used to identify the site where the Zerto Virtual Manager runs.
SITE_VIEW.HOST_NAME_HELP: The name or IP address of the machine where the Zerto Virtual Manager runs.
SITE_VIEW.PORT_HELP: The port used access the Zerto Virtual Manager at the site.
SITE_VIEW.TYPE_HELP: The type of the site. vCenter, vCloud Director, AWS or Azure.
SITE_VIEW.EMAIL_HELP: The email to contact in case of a DR emergency.
SITE_VIEW.PHONE_HELP: The phone number to contact in case of a DR emergency.
